name: GRIDHEART
description:
Blip and blop your way around an increasingly convoluted GRID of squares to collect the HEART and achieve a satisfactory score for the leaderboards.

But please be careful; with combos, time limits, and general circumstance to keep track of, there is a lot that could go wrong.

The wonderful people associated in the creation of this one are:

• Himadri for the Art and UI Design

• Luke Evans and Cai Jones as the Sound Designers

• DarkroomCA for the Music

• PaperDawN for the Cover Art

Props to YellowAfterLife for the wizardry involved in the Custom Cursor and Mouse Lock technology used ingame. 

And also to globalstats.io for providing the servers and API used for the online scoreboard.
